summary: Research completed for simplifying himalaya threading keybindings. Current implementation has 6 threading keys (Tab, zo, zc, zR, zM, gT). Task requires reducing to 2 keys: Tab for single thread toggle, S-Tab for toggle all threads. Identified 3 files to modify: email_list.lua (add toggle_all_threads function), ui.lua (update keymaps), folder_help.lua (simplify help content).

artifacts.summary: Research report with implementation approach for simplifying himalaya threading keybindings
